title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid email and password, receiving a JWT token and user details.

steps.description: Navigate to the login endpoint
Send POST request with valid email and password
Receive 200 HTTP response with a JWT token and valid user object

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with wrong email or password and proper error response is returned.

steps.description: Navigate to the login endpoint
Send POST request with invalid email or password
Receive 401 Unauthorized response with error message

title: JWT Token Validation and Role-based Access Control
description: Verify that JWT tokens are required for protected endpoints and users can only access endpoints matching their role permissions.

steps.description: Access protected API endpoint without JWT
Access is denied with 401 Unauthorized
Access protected API endpoint with JWT from user with insufficient role
Access is denied with 403 Forbidden
Access protected API endpoint with valid JWT and correct role
Access is granted with successful response

title: Create New Partner with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new partner (vendor, buyer, investor, etc.) can be created successfully with all required fields.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/partners with valid name, type, cpfCnpj, email, and phone
Receive 201 Created response with newly created partner data
Fetch partners list and verify the new partner is present
New partner is listed in partners

title: Create New Partner with Missing Required Fields
description: Verify that creation of a partner fails when required fields are missing or invalid.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/partners with missing name or invalid type
Receive 400 Bad Request with validation error message

title: Register New Cattle Purchase with Valid Details
description: Verify that a new cattle purchase can be registered with correct vendor ID, payer account, animals count, weights, prices, and total amount.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/cattle-purchases with valid purchase data
Receive 201 Created response with purchase details and assigned purchase ID

title: Register Cattle Purchase with Mismatched Total Amount
description: Verify system validates that totalAmount matches pricePerKg * totalWeight and rejects incorrect totals.

steps.description: Send POST request with valid quantities but incorrect totalAmount field
Receive 400 Bad Request with error indicating mismatched total

title: List All Cattle Purchases Pagination and Filtering
description: Verify that GET /api/v1/cattle-purchases returns paginated list and supports filtering by date range and vendor.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/cattle-purchases with different page and limit query parameters
Receive paginated response with expected number of purchase records

title: Record New Expense and Validate Fields
description: Verify that a new financial expense can be recorded with category, description, totalAmount, and dueDate fields validated.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/expenses with valid expense data
Receive 201 Created response with expense record

title: Record Expense with Missing or Invalid Fields
description: Verify system rejects expense creation with missing category or ill-formatted dueDate.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/expenses with missing category or invalid dueDate
Receive 400 Bad Request and appropriate error message

title: Retrieve Financial Reports and Dashboard Analytics
description: Verify API provides correct financial analytics data on revenues, expenses, and cash flow within expected response time.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/analytics for financial summaries
Receive 200 OK with correct summary data fitting current financial state

title: Create and Manage Pens with Capacity Constraints
description: Verify creating pens and allocating animals respects capacity limits and rejects over-allocation attempts.

steps.description: Send POST request to create a pen with a defined capacity
Pen is created and retrievable
Allocate animals to pen within capacity limits
Allocation succeeds
Attempt to allocate animals exceeding capacity
Receive error response indicating capacity exceeded

title: Sales Pipeline Management and Kanban Board Interaction
description: Verify that sales registrations, updates, and status moves on Kanban board are reflected correctly in API data.

steps.description: Register new sale record via POST /api/v1/sale-records
Sale record is created and lists in GET /api/v1/sale-records
Update sale status simulating Kanban move
Sale status is updated correctly and reflected in subsequent GET requests

title: Register and Retrieve Veterinary Interventions
description: Verify that veterinary and sanitary interventions can be created and retrieved, maintaining data integrity and timeline.

steps.description: POST a new veterinary intervention with associated data
Intervention is stored and retrievable via GET /api/v1/interventions

title: Calendar Events Creation and Reminder Functionality
description: Verify the integrated calendar lets users create events and receive reminders, including recurring events and synchronization.

steps.description: Create new calendar event with date, title, description via POST /api/v1/calendar-events
Event appears in GET /api/v1/calendar-events and reminders schedule correctly

title: Perform Health Check Endpoint Validation
description: Verify system health check endpoint returns system and database status indicating overall availability.

steps.description: Send GET request to /health endpoint
Receive 200 OK with status data indicating healthy systems

title: Data Protection and Compliance with LGPD During User Data Handling
description: Verify user data requests, updates, and deletions comply with data protection laws and encrypted storage policies.

steps.description: Update user personal data via authenticated endpoint
Data updates are encrypted and audited
Request personal data download and data deletion via appropriate endpoints
Data is provided/deleted as per LGPD requirements and audit logs are maintained

title: Performance Test: Ensure API Response Time Below 500ms
description: Verify that all critical APIs respond within 500 milliseconds under standard load conditions.

steps.description: Send requests to major API endpoints concurrently
All responses return in under 500ms

title: UI Responsive Layout and Accessibility Check
description: Verify that the web UI properly adapts on mobile and desktop viewport sizes and meets accessibility standards.

steps.description: Load the main application on various screen sizes including mobile and desktop
UI elements are readable, clickable, and correctly arranged without horizontal scroll
Run accessibility audit using automated tools (e.g. axe-core)
No critical accessibility violations are present

title: Automated Cleanup of Test Data
description: Verify the test data cleanup endpoint correctly removes test data from the system without affecting production data.

steps.description: Insert test data via test data API
Call DELETE /api/v1/test-data/cleanup endpoint
Test data is removed while production data is intact
